recipesJson.name: Graham Slam remix (The Mamasan)
recipesJson.author: Slushy
recipesJson.description: Honey Graham crackers and milk simple short and sweet a little change of pace...Flavorah milk and honey is pretty much the star of the show..

reviews.text: Gonna have to disagree with the SnV and the 7 day steep. Tried around the 10 day mark and something was off almost yuk. Found it and tried it at the 7 week mark and this pretty God damn tasty. Never had the original but im sure it's not this tasty.
